attributes.action: reconsider, Watford star, Al Bangura's deportation back to Sierra Leone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of how Al got here, he pays a 6-figure sum of tax each year, he's hardly a drain on society is he? He has a 9 day old child, and has started a family here in the UK. He is heavily involved in community work with Watford FC, and is an asset to both the club and community. Let common sense prevail, and let Al stay!

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
